TopicTitle: Advanced Grabbing Unit should also grab ground

Articles.Content:
Advanced Grabbing Unit should also be able to grab the ground of planets and moons. This makes a lot of sense on low gravity moons. The size of an anchored craft would be limited by the gravity of the body and the structural integrity of the craft.

I just got my sweet kethane refiner with grabber unit to Gilly to set up a near-Eve refueling operation after my rover kethane refiner failed miserably in the moon's very weak gravity. I was super disappointed when my hopes of anchoring the refiner were dashed by this oversight.

Welcome to the forums mate. If I remember correctly Harv has started in the past that this is a goal but is limited by the way the claw works at this time (a one sided docking port). By the way you need to upload your image to a hosting service such as imgur and then use the link provided.
